locale.message: Crossref Reference Linking
The plugin adds extracted article references to the DOI registration with Crossref, checks for the found references DOIs, and displays them on the article page.

This plugin will automatically add the extracted article references to the DOI registration with Crossref. Crossref will then automatically check if any DOIs can be found for the submitted references. Shortly after that, you can use the plugin to check for the found references DOIs, either automatically using the option below or manually in the submission metadata tab "References". Be aware that your article references should not change once you registered a DOI, else you would need to register the DOI anew, and check for the found references DOIs again.
Be aware that your article references should not change once you registered the DOI, else you need to register the DOI anew and check for the found references DOIs again.
This plugin requires Crossref DOIs to be assigned to articles, article references to be separately entered and extracted, as well as article DOIs to be deposited to Crossref from within OJS.
To check for the found Crossref references DOIs your Crossref username and password are needed.
